available_tests_fields.context_print_dt: Prints the incident's context dt directly to the build.
available_tests_fields.external_playbook_config: Allows to configure a test playbook inputs.
available_tests_fields.fromversion: Server version to start testing from.
available_tests_fields.has_api: Determines whether a test playbook uses API, to decide if to run it on nightly. Default value for integrations is true, and for scripts is false.
available_tests_fields.instance_configuration: Allows to configure integration instance non-parameters classifier and incoming mapper.
available_tests_fields.instance_names: Specific instance names the test should run on. Can hold a list.
available_tests_fields.integrations: Integrations that the test uses. Can hold a list.
available_tests_fields.is_mockable: Determines whether the results can be mocked in the test. A boolean.
available_tests_fields.memory_threshold: Maximum amount of memory required for this test. A number.
available_tests_fields.nightly: Determines whether the test will run only on a nightly build. Relevant only for nightly packs. A boolean.
available_tests_fields.pid_threshold: Maximum amount of processes allowed for this test. A number.
available_tests_fields.playbookID: ID of the playbook that is being tested.
available_tests_fields.runnable_on_docker_only: Determines whether the test is runnable on docker only. A boolean.
available_tests_fields.scripts: Scripts that the test uses. Can hold a list.
available_tests_fields.timeout: Test specific timeout, in order to use a different timeout then default testTimeout. A number.
available_tests_fields.toversion: Server version to test up to it. Set it only when a real limit exists, otherwise use the 'marketplaces' field.
available_tests_fields.marketplaces: Marketplaces that the test should run on. Available options are: xsoar (which runs on xsoar_on_prem and xsoar_saas), xsoar_on_prem, xsoar_saas, marketplacev2 and xpanse. Can hold a list. Default value is xsoar and marketplacev2.

tests.playbookID: Carbon Black Enterprise EDR process search with polling Test
PAN-OS - Block URL - Custom URL Category
Cortex XDR - Retrieve File by sha256
